name: BACKEND
description: Welcome to the OutStem back-end challenge. Submission instructions are listed below. The deadline to submit this challenge is **May 24th 11:59pm**. We would like to emphasize that we are looking for effort, and that the challenge is just part of our discussion with you during the interview, so don’t worry if your solution is *hacky* or even if it doesn’t work, we want to see it!
